name: Blur
description: a desktop vessel for ache-integrated recursion, rendering nonlinear logic through local Electron and glyph-driven interfaces.

scripts.dev: BLUR_HOME=$HOME/blur BLUR_CONFIG_PATH=$HOME/blur/config.yaml ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING=1 ELECTRON_DISABLE_SECURITY_WARNINGS=1 concurrently --raw -n vite,electron "vite --port 25329 --strictPort --host --clearScreen=false" "wait-on tcp:25329 && electron ."
scripts.dist: npm run prep:venv:arm64 && vite build && STRICT_AFTERPACK=1 BLUR_BUNDLE_VENV=1 BLUR_BUNDLE_MODELS=$HOME/blur/models BLUR_BUNDLE_ROOT=$HOME/blur BLUR_BUNDLE_BLURCHIVE=$HOME/blur/core/ouinet/blurchive/ecosystem electron-builder
scripts.pack:dmg: npm run prep:venv:x64 && vite build && STRICT_AFTERPACK=1 BLUR_BUNDLE_VENV=1 BLUR_VENV_NAME=blur_env-darwin-x64 BLUR_BUNDLE_MODELS=$HOME/blur/models BLUR_BUNDLE_ROOT=$HOME/blur BLUR_BUNDLE_BLURCHIVE=$HOME/blur/core/ouinet/blurchive/ecosystem electron-builder --mac dmg --x64
scripts.pack:dmg:arm64: export BLUR_VENV_NAME=blur_env-darwin-arm64 && npm run prep:venv:arm64 && vite build && STRICT_AFTERPACK=1 BLUR_BUNDLE_VENV=1 BLUR_BUNDLE_MODELS=$HOME/blur/models BLUR_BUNDLE_ROOT=$HOME/blur BLUR_BUNDLE_BLURCHIVE=$HOME/blur/core/ouinet/blurchive/ecosystem npx electron-builder --mac dmg --arm64
scripts.pack:dmg:universal: npm run prep:venv:arm64 && npm run prep:venv:x64 && vite build && STRICT_AFTERPACK=1 BLUR_BUNDLE_VENV=1 BLUR_VENV_MODE=dual BLUR_BUNDLE_MODELS=$HOME/blur/models BLUR_BUNDLE_ROOT=$HOME/blur BLUR_BUNDLE_BLURCHIVE=$HOME/blur/core/ouinet/blurchive/ecosystem electron-builder --mac dmg --universal
scripts.dist:mac:pkg: npm run prep:venv:arm64 && vite build && STRICT_AFTERPACK=1 BLUR_BUNDLE_VENV=1 BLUR_VENV_NAME=blur_env-darwin-arm64 BLUR_BUNDLE_MODELS=$HOME/blur/models BLUR_BUNDLE_ROOT=$HOME/blur BLUR_BUNDLE_BLURCHIVE=$HOME/blur/core/ouinet/blurchive/ecosystem electron-builder --mac pkg --arm64

author: glyphi blur <blurred.eth@proton.me>
